name: Final Fantasy TCG Hidden Trials Booster Box (36 packs)
description: Continuing its 7th consecutive year celebration, FFTCG will be back better than ever this summer with Hidden Trials, a brand new Opus that will push the boundaries even further!The Limit Break system can significantly turn the tides of battle with custom-themed cards enabling players to experience a true revolution, right from the deck-building phase.For the collectors, the set will once again include a very rare, Special Card [23-037R] showcasing the beloved Lightning from FINAL FANTASY XIII in a stunning original artwork. Artist Yamashita-sanâ€™s autograph will also be foil-printed on the card.Hidden Trials will see the return of the ever-popular Legacy Cards in the form of three Legends from past releases: Lightning [15-041L], Rydia [15-083L], and Refia [19-102L]. Players purchasing sealed displays will also be rewarded with a box-topper card (details TBC).Card CountNormal: 130 cardsPremium: 162 cards(of these, 30 are full art cards, 1 is a Special Card and 1 is a Crystal Card)Legacy cards / Special cards3 Legacy cardsLightning [15-041L]Rydia [15-083L]Refia [19-102L]1 Special cardLightning [23-037R]
